entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
